TopicTitle: How to get extra crew portraits to appear with modified command pod?

Articles.Content: I'd like to modify the cupola command pod to have a crew capacity of 2 (it's basically the same size as the Mk2 Lander can, so why does it only hold one person? ). Editing the crew capacity in the .cfg is simple enough, but only one portrait shows up even though there's 2 guys in there. Is there a way to make both portraits show up?
This is part of the .mu file. Since you are working with a stock part you aren't going to have access to that. So essentially you aren't going to be able to add more portraits.
I was figuring it was in one of those other files, which i see are proprietary. Thanks.
It requires a new internal IVA in order for both of them to show up in the windows.
